categories.name: Lighting
categories.metaDescription: Discover Elk Home's indoor and outdoor lighting: chandeliers, pendants, ceiling lights, lamps, and exterior fixtures. Illuminate your life with Elk Home.

subCategories.name: Brand
subCategories.metaDescription: Elk Home offers lighting, furniture and decor collections for every design style and budget. Choose from Elk Lighting, Elk Home, Thomas Lighting, and Norwell.

subCategories.name: Elk Lighting
subCategories.metaDescription: Our Elk Lighting Collection offers high-quality lighting for every home. From craftsmen to contemporary and chandeliers to outdoor sconces, we've got you covered.

subCategories.name: Elk Home
subCategories.metaDescription: Discover Elk Lighting’s indoor and outdoor lighting collections, featuring chandeliers, pendants, flush mounts, vanities, sconces, and exterior fixtures. Illuminate your life with Elk Lighting.

subCategories.name: Thomas Lighting
subCategories.metaDescription: Thomas Lighting offers builder-focused lighting for every home. From craftsman to contemporary and chandeliers to outdoor sconces, we've got you covered.

subCategories.name: Ceiling
subCategories.metaDescription: Shop Elk Lighting's collection of ceiling-hung lighting, including chandeliers, pendants, flush mount, and semi-flush mount fixtures.

subCategories.name: Chandeliers
subCategories.metaDescription: Explore Elk Lighting's variety of chandeliers. Our styles range from traditional to modern and add a focal point to your living, dining, bedroom, or foyer.

subCategories.name: Linear Chandeliers
subCategories.metaDescription: Elk Lighting's linear chandeliers are the perfect accent for a kitchen or dining room. These chandeliers and pendants come in many styles and shade types.

subCategories.name: Pendants
subCategories.metaDescription: Elk Lighting's pendants provide task and ambient lighting. Available in a range of styles, they are great over an island, breakfast nook, nightstand, or vanity.

subCategories.name: Flush + Semi Flush
subCategories.metaDescription: Discover Elk Lighting's range of flush mount and semi flush mount lighting. Perfect for a hallway, bathroom, entryway, or any space with low ceilings.

subCategories.name: Portable
subCategories.metaDescription: Elk Home offers portable lamps that provide both ambient and task lighting to your space. Shop our selection of table and floor lamps.

subCategories.name: Floor Lamps
subCategories.metaDescription: Floor lamps offer task and ambient lighting to any room you choose. Available in traditional, transitional, and contemporary styles to meet your home's needs.

subCategories.name: Table Lamps
subCategories.metaDescription: Brighten up your corner of the world with Elk Home's table lamps. Portable in your choice of style, finish, and shade. Use in an office, living or bedroom.

subCategories.name: Wall
subCategories.metaDescription: Shop Elk Home's assortment of wall-mounted lighting, included bath bars, vanity lights, and wall sconces.

subCategories.name: Bath + Vanity
subCategories.metaDescription: Vanity lighting adds style to your bathroom while supplying task lighting for grooming. Elk Home has bath bars and vanity lights in 2, 3, and 4 light varieties.

subCategories.name: Sconces
subCategories.metaDescription: Discover Elk Home's range of wall sconce lighting. Versatile in style and application, our sconces can be used in a hallway, dining room, bedroom, or bathroom.

subCategories.name: Outdoor
subCategories.metaDescription: Illuminate your home's exterior with our broad range of outdoor lighting. Choose from flush mounts, pendants, wall sconces, and post lanterns.

subCategories.name: Ceiling Lights
subCategories.metaDescription: Illuminate your porch or portico with an outdoor-rated flush mount ceiling light. Choose from a variety of styles and finishes that withstand the elements.

subCategories.name: Hanging Lights
subCategories.metaDescription: Illuminate your front entry with an outdoor-rated hanging pendant light. Available in various finishes and glass types that are beautiful and built to last.

subCategories.name: Outdoor Lamps
subCategories.metaDescription: Bring the conveniences of indoors outside with our collection of outdoor floor and table lamps. Create unique spaces with beautiful decorative lighting that stands the test of time (and climate!)

subCategories.name: Post Lights
subCategories.metaDescription: Light the way with Elk Home's post lanterns. Perfect for any outdoor space and offered in a range of silhouettes and styles to withstand the elements.

subCategories.name: Wall Lights
subCategories.metaDescription: Brighten your home's exterior and enhance your curb appeal with wall lanterns. Elk Home's outdoor sconces are available in styles from contemporary to craftsmen.

subCategories.name: New Arrivals
subCategories.metaDescription: Shop the newest additions to our lighting assortment.

categories.name: Furniture
categories.metaDescription: Discover Elk Home's indoor and outdoor furniture: tables, chairs, benches, chests, and more. Style your life with Elk Home.

subCategories.name: Seating
subCategories.metaDescription: Elk Home offers seating that is both functional and stylish. Shop our selection of benches, chairs, and sofas.

subCategories.name: Benches + Ottomans
subCategories.metaDescription: Functional and stylish, a bench is an ideal seating option for bedrooms, entryways, and smaller spaces. Choose from a range of sizes, materials, and colors.

subCategories.name: Chairs
subCategories.metaDescription: Elk Home offers dining chairs, arm chairs, and accent chairs in a variety of materials, textures, color, and styles. This seating complements any room or space.

subCategories.name: Stools
subCategories.metaDescription: Our selection of stools are fashionable and versatile. Our selection of accent stools, garden stools, bar and counter height stools is sure to enhance your space and reflect your personal style.

subCategories.name: Storage
subCategories.metaDescription: Shop Elk Home's collection of stylish storage and display solutions. We offer a variety of bookcases, cabinets, and chests.

subCategories.name: Bookcases + Shelves
subCategories.metaDescription: Bookshelves are a fundamental storage accent for any room. Display your favorite décor and show your personal style with our assortment of bookcases.

subCategories.name: Cabinets + Credenzas
subCategories.metaDescription: Cabinets and credenzas add extra storage and style to your home office, living, dining, or bedroom. Organize your media and keep clutter out of sight.

subCategories.name: Chests
subCategories.metaDescription: Chests offer storage, style, and organization for your entryway, living, or bedroom. Drawers eliminate clutter while the top allows for décor to be displayed.

subCategories.name: Tables
subCategories.metaDescription: Elk Home's assortment of tables meets every functional and design need. Choose from accent tables, cocktail / coffee tables, console tables, and dining tables.

subCategories.name: Accent Tables
subCategories.metaDescription: Use an accent table to bring interest to a space, or opt for a pair to balance any room. Choose from glam, rustic, glass, wood, round, square, etc.

subCategories.name: Coffee Tables
subCategories.metaDescription: Coffee tables are multifunctional and can serve as accent pieces or the focal point of the room. A living room staple that adds instant storage and style.

subCategories.name: Console Tables + Desks
subCategories.metaDescription: The linear nature of the console table and desk makes them ideal for a hall, foyer, living room, or office. Available in various materials and finishes to complement your style.

subCategories.name: Dining Tables
subCategories.metaDescription: Gather in style with Elk Home's dining tables. Our high-quality tables range from traditional to modern in both materials and finishes for your dining space.

subCategories.name: Outdoor
subCategories.metaDescription: Find outdoor furniture for your patio, deck, or balcony at Elk Home. We offer different styles of tables and chairs in materials made to withstand the elements.

subCategories.name: New Arrivals
subCategories.metaDescription: Shop the newest additions to our furniture assortment.

categories.name: Decor
categories.metaDescription: Discover Elk Home's indoor and outdoor decor: accessories, wall décor, and textiles. Decorate your life with Elk Home.

subCategories.name: Accessories
subCategories.metaDescription: Explore Elk Home's selection of decorative accessories to style your space: bookends, boxes, trays, frames, vases and more.

subCategories.name: Baskets + Boxes
subCategories.metaDescription: From baskets to boxes, eliminate clutter with a stylish storage solution that complements your home's design and offers easy organization.

subCategories.name: Bowls + Trays
subCategories.metaDescription: Both functional and decorative, bowls and trays serve as a base for displaying your favorite accents. Available in an array of materials, colors, and textures.

subCategories.name: Candleholders
subCategories.metaDescription: Add light and warmth to your space with our candleholders. Choose from various shapes, styles, and colors to accent your room's specific aesthetic.

subCategories.name: Decorative Objects
subCategories.metaDescription: Decorative objects like orbs, statuettes, bookends, and figurines add that special design touch to enhance the style of a room. Coastal, farmhouse, you name it.

subCategories.name: Frames + Easels
subCategories.metaDescription: Capture your favorite memories or beloved art prints in Elk Home's assortment of picture frames. A frame should enhance the picture and the space. Our easels are the perfect complement.

subCategories.name: Tabletop
subCategories.metaDescription: Elk Home's assortment of tabletop decor includes servingware, centerpieces, and decorative containers so you can dine in style.

subCategories.name: Vases + Vessels
subCategories.metaDescription: Add personality to your shelves or tabletop with a decorative vase, jar, or container. These vessels are available in many sizes, materials, and colors.

subCategories.name: Planters
subCategories.metaDescription: Extend your personal style to your outdoor space. Style your porch, patio, or garden with our selection of planters.

subCategories.name: Textiles
subCategories.metaDescription: Discover Elk Home's assortment of decorative pillows and poufs to add instant comfort and personality to your home.

subCategories.name: Pillows
subCategories.metaDescription: Choose from throw and lumbar pillows in a variety of fabrics, textures, colors, and styles to add comfort and dimension to a sofa or bed.

subCategories.name: Poufs
subCategories.metaDescription: Decorative poufs offer the comfort of a pillow with the substance of an ottoman. This cushy seating or footrest is a versatile option for a living room or den.

subCategories.name: Wall Decor
subCategories.metaDescription: Fill your home's blank canvas with our selection of wall decor. Choose from framed wall art, wall clocks, wall mirrors, and wall shelving.

subCategories.name: Artwork
subCategories.metaDescription: Showcase your personality by adding wall art to your room. Our selection of artwork comes in your choice of color palette and subject, framed and ready to hang.

subCategories.name: Clocks
subCategories.metaDescription: Add character and calendar to your décor with an attractive and functional timepiece. Adorn your walls with a wall clock in your choice of size and material.

subCategories.name: Mirrors
subCategories.metaDescription: Create the illusion of more space with the addition of a wall mirror. Our assortment of mirrors vary in size, shape, and finish to meet your style needs.

subCategories.name: New Arrivals
subCategories.metaDescription: Shop the newest additions to our home decor assortment.
